alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 9:50PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts around 10 to 12 inches at the highest elevations. Light ice accumulations are also possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 to 70 mph with blowing snow expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee and southwest North Carolina. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
